entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning.
